title: Technology exec says AI fuels blue-collar productivity boom, not job losses
description: Palantir chief technology officer Shyam Sankar says artificial intelligence technology is creating a blue-collar productivity boom, helping ICU nurses and factory workers.
content: Palantir chief technology officer Shyam Sankar told FOX Business that artificial intelligence (AI) is fueling a blue-collar productivity boom – not mass unemployment as forecast by Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt. – and said AI is accelerating hiring, trai... [4465 chars]

title: CNBC Daily Open: Concerns over Oracle's debt spill over into its projects
description: Despite the recent pullback in artificial intelligence stocks, the Bank of America thinks "the AI trade may still have room to run into 2026."
content:
The apprehension investors have surrounding Oracle has spilled over from manifesting in its stock price — which has fallen nearly 50% from its all-time high on Sept. 10 — to affecting its projects.

title: TCS pegs AI revenue at $1.5 billion, $11 billion from new-age services
description: In a first for large homegrown IT services companies, Tata Consultancy Services Ltd (TCS) said on Wednesday that it earns $11 billion in revenue from disruptive technologies, including $1.5 billion from artificial intelligence (AI).

title: Is AI already conscious? Evidence is 'far too limited' to definitively say artificial intelligence hasn't made the leap, expert claims
description: Artificial intelligence ( AI) is already helping to solve problems in finance, research and medicine. But could it be reaching consciousness?
content:
